code.title: Code Samples and Snippets
code.description: Every single code sample and snippet that is discussed in the book, and then _a few more_, which didn't make it into the book.

speed-matters.title: Speed Still Matters
speed-matters.description: In this blog post, renowned Jeff Atwood, of [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com "Stack Overflow Q&A Site") fame goes over anecdotes about how Google and Amazon tested their sites' perceived speed, and their interesting conclusions.
